home.text_base_description: Highly coveted South Park luxury loft filled w/ style & a sophisticated European blend from the footsteps to interior updates. Rarely available 2 bed floorplan boasts an exquisite custom interior w/ one of kind colors, textures, design throughout. Enter & experience the soaring ceilings & an abundance of natural light leading into the living room & chefs kitchen. Updated w/ new stainless steel refrigerator, oven & hood, dishwasher & hardwood flooring. Exclusive upgrades include high-tech frosted soft close bedroom door, recessed lighting in both beds, nest thermostat, smart enabled lighting, window & privacy blinds enabled for sunrise/sunset automation, smart backlit mirror w/ anti-fog capabilities, heated towel warmer. You can't find a neighborhood filled w/ charm and elegance anywhere else. South Park recently updated in 2017 & is at your front door along with charming restaurants, nearby Michelin restaurants, Oracle Park, easy on/off freeway access, all the benefits of South Beach nearby

home_facts.Property_Type: Low-Rise (1-3), Top Floor, End Unit, 2 Level, Luxury, Condominium
